title: Please Fix This
text:
I just recently moved to Puerto Rico from Tennessee. I used to order from SHEIN RELIGIOUSLY because I love it so much. I suggested it to all my friends and family and we all enjoy it. Recently I tried to place an order to be shipped here in Puerto Rico and it tried to send it to my old address in Tennessee. When I tried changing the address inside the order it told me it couldn‚Äôt be changed due to limited stock in the warehouses here. 
I was sadly forced to cancel my order that I was very excited for. 
PLEASE create a way for people to see if the item is available for the location they are in. There is a little under 15$ tied up into my SHEIN account wallet now because SHEIN couldn‚Äôt refund it to my bank card. But I‚Äôll never get to use the money in my SHEIN wallet because I don‚Äôt know what you do and don‚Äôt ship here to Augadilla, Puerto Rico.
